Scenario
    For each spot ID provide all cta links.
    Get the page source of the website home page.
    Check if all cta links are in the page source.

JQL
    summary ~ "Go Live" AND status = Closed AND created >= -15d

SQL
    SELECT spot_id,url,cta_link_type FROM cta_links WHERE spot_id IN (
    552190,555390,555391,552189,395153,482097,546882,302084,180267,153175,6361,112021,175294,606283,593769,514464,58890,31398,569250,138832,49640,88316,226962,565329,563412,563411,395272,563413,563410,91091,542519,558721,213739,112200,306412,573045,107955,29139,144883,428163,377618,578490,419015,613173,525459,497503,88106,231571,300234,620136,482795,98887,74790,137329,277571,531899,531897,558660,329885,599379,252285,580627,536779,164545,124351,139360,598852,330957,419063,377630,238986,31172,232325,395251,605022,513998,558105,614724,558718,603938,13329,295897,586476,400284,582352,578590,600534,568645,93172,116529,363825,410268,365674,92304,577962,539550,486519,579546,170178,167188,626672,504226,110146,81341,94127,354972,585948,119958,203487,35003,105893,299306,35227,583209,619938,83212,484343,484342,616044,78985,283734,287861,133449,85698,510279,568489,602414,579184,315414,448800,139370,60513,483047,518991,577500,247435,577566,55869,283782,119199,581593,613470,592746,542332,551551,408604,546114,138139,543216,595056,10121,572079,573309,261503,614464,585849,575421,70321,123289,542718,559218,586391,129010,590172,544706,609412,90523,582483,599941,319460,410983,546956,115848,599940,127275,543444,608982,111108,549648,454311,62142,582055,553938,85252,223325,556646,577533,10385,110674,471999,554573,299226,121017,536381,599049,526086,572237,101887,513955,49563,598918,546089,124968,516681,43713,138670,133428,127734,573639,19576,382133,91148,566445,30352,87202,574365,100162,551207,534843,558323,590836,31527,305019,527325,109159,578953,313556,86777,268470,144450,115395,570966,165299,568725,595188,60842,135159,578919,54049,361586,484341,593969,566381,444942,147370,537141,451209,573705,579645,615389,581230,585684,75243,578194,150047
    );

Java
    execution command:
        mvn compile exec:java
    Java HTML parser
        org.jsoup.Jsoup
        Used for fetching, parsing, and manipulating realâ€‘world HTML.
        It lets to connect to a URL, download the page, and work with its DOM using CSS selectors.
